long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SeekAll
One Click, Seek All Results for You.
With SeekAll, searching across multiple platforms is as easy as a single click. Whether you're browsing for fun or working on a project, you'll get comprehensive results instantly.

SeekAll Changelog
1.6.0 The version optimized the one-click search function by right-clicking after selecting text; added the custom combination function, and you can click the shortcut combination button to search with one click.
1.5.4 The version added category sorting and website sorting functions, you can customize the order you want.
1.5.3 The version modify various small details, optimize the experience, add multi-language interface, and support Chinese and English display.
1.4.1 The version adds the custom search engine function, allowing you to add various search engines you want.
1.4.0 The version adds a sidebar vertical tab mode, allowing you to more easily manage multiple open tabs and tab groups.
1.3.1 The version supports the choice of opening in a new window or a new tab, and is no longer limited to a maximum of 3 selections.

SeekAll Supported Search Engines:
- AI Search Engines: Perplexity, ThinkAny, Devv, and more.
- AI Assistant: ChatGPT, Claude, Kimi, and others.
- Traditional Search Engines: Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, and others.
- Social Media Platforms: YouTube, Twitter, FaceBook, and more.

Key Features of SeekAll:
🔍 Multi-Engine Search: Enter your query once and get results from multiple search engines at the same time. Easily compare and analyze, saving you time and effort.
⚙️ Customizable Search Engines: Personalize your search experience by adding, removing, and organizing your favorite search engines into categories. Create a search platform that works just the way you like it.
📑 Efficient Tab Management: Vertical tab management in the sidebar lets you quickly switch between tabs and groups, boosting your productivity whether you’re browsing or working.
💻 Flexible Search Options: Choose how you want your search results to open—whether in a new window or tab. Customize your experience with options like displaying follow-up queries or replacing default tabs.

Why Choose SeekAll?
🚀 Simplify Your Search Process: No more jumping from one search engine to another. SeekAll brings all the results to you at once, making your search more efficient.
🔒 Privacy Matters: We respect your privacy—SeekAll doesn't store your search data, ensuring your information stays safe.

Try SeekAll Today
Download SeekAll now and experience a smarter, more efficient way to search the web!

Learn More
Official website: https://seekall.ai/
Privacy Policy: https://seekall.ai/privacy.html
User Agreement: https://seekall.ai/TermsServices.html
long.zh_CN:
SeekAll
一键尽揽所有搜索结果
One Click, Seek All Results for You

SeekAll 更新日志
1.6.0 优化了选中文字后右键一键搜索功能；增加自定义组合功能，并且可以点击快捷组合按钮一键搜索。
1.5.4 增加分类排序和网站排序功能，你可以自定义你想要的顺序了。
1.5.3 修改各种小细节，优化体验，增加多语言界面，支持中英文展示。
1.4.1 最新版增加了自定义搜索引擎功能，让你可以添加各种自己想要的搜索引擎进来。
1.4.0 最新版增加了侧边栏垂直标签页模式，让你更方便管理打开的多个标签页和标签分组。
1.3.1 最新版本支持选择用新窗口打开还是新标签页打开，也不再限制最多只能选择3个。

SeekAll 插件介绍
使用 SeekAll，让你一键即可在多个平台上同时搜索，无论是日常浏览还是专业工作，轻松获得全面的搜索结果。
我们支持多种类型的搜索工具，包括：
- AI 搜索引擎：Perplexity、ThinkAny、秘塔等
- AI 对话工具：智谱清言、豆包、文心一言等
- 传统搜索引擎：必应、搜狗、百度等
- 社交媒体平台：小红书、抖音、微博等

SeekAll 功能特点
🔍 多引擎对比搜索：只需输入一次问题，即可同时在多个搜索引擎上获取结果，方便快速对比分析，省时省力。
⚙️ 自定义搜索引擎：添加、删除和编辑你的常用搜索引擎，并进行分类管理，打造属于你的搜索平台。
📑 便捷的标签管理：侧边栏垂直标签管理功能，让你在多个标签页和分组间快速切换，提高浏览和工作效率。
💻 灵活的浏览选项：自由选择在新窗口或新标签页中打开搜索结果，还可以自定义是否显示追问框或替换默认标签页，优化你的搜索体验。

为什么选择 SeekAll？
🚀 简化搜索流程：告别在多个搜索引擎间重复提问的麻烦，SeekAll 将同时展示多个搜索结果，帮助你更高效地获取所需信息。
🔒 保护你的隐私：我们非常重视用户隐私，SeekAll 不会存储你的任何搜索数据，确保你的信息安全。

立即体验 SeekAll 
马上下载并试用 SeekAll，发现更高效、更便捷的搜索方式！

官网： https://seekall.ai/
隐私政策： https://seekall.ai/privacy.html
用户协议： https://seekall.ai/TermsServices.html
